item.title: Initial dev config of cmder and git
item.description: Git A version control, which anybody should be familiar with (at least when one is a developer 😀). The configuration is simple two steps - ssh keys generation, and .gitconfig generating ssh keys Covered in Cmder minimal section .gitconfig Basic config with aliases, additional tools…. [core] editor = \"C:/tools/GitExtensions/GitExtensions.exe\" fileeditor # editor = vim autocrlf = true # commentChar = ";" # in case hash is not desired comment char in the commit message files [user] email = .
